issue.title: Regarding the broken models 'Hinged door' and 'Door handle'

content.raw:
The following models did not have a model.config edited in pull request #79 (determined by using the 
[bitbucket_client_tool bb](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/bitbucket-client-tools/src/b18877778872f52e713f7002fa8100d36935eb9d/bin/bb?at=default)):
~~~
# $PWD is in hg repo of gazebo_models
$ bb -f 79 | sed -e 's@/.*@@' | uniq -c | grep -v '^ *3' | sed -e 's@^ *2 @@'
bookshelf
cabinet
door_handle
drc_practice_2x4
drc_practice_2x6
drc_practice_4x4x20
drc_practice_4x4x40
drc_practice_ball_valve
drc_practice_ball_valve_wall
drc_practice_base_4x8
drc_practice_block_wall
drc_practice_door_4x8
drc_practice_hand_wheel_valve
drc_practice_hand_wheel_valve_wall
drc_practice_handle_wheel_valve
drc_practice_handle_wheel_valve_wall
drc_practice_ladder
drc_practice_truss
drc_practice_valve_wall
drc_practice_wheel_valve
drc_practice_wheel_valve_large
drc_practice_wheel_valve_large_wall
drc_practice_wheel_valve_wall
drc_practice_wood_slats
fire_hose_long
fire_hose_long_curled
hinged_door
irobot_hand
standpipe
~~~

# $PWD is in hg repo of gazebo_models
$ bb -f 79 | sed -e 's@/.*@@' | uniq -c | grep -v '^ *3' | sed -e 's@^ *2 @@'
